short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make use of the advanced search and export features of Outreachbot, right from your browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension allows users to search for companies and people on LinkedIn when they use the main search functionality on the Outreachbot website. The product "Outreachbot" searches databases and connected CRMs simultaneously for companies and people. Users are able to push information from databases to their CRM system with a few clicks. The extension adds the social networking site LinkedIn to the list of sites that can be searched. Without the extension users are not able to search on LinkedIn. The product is intended to save time for transferring data to a CRM and avoid having to copy paste information.
